Description: Limestone tomb-relief, decorated with two scenes, including an inscription mentioning Neferhotep.
Curator's comments: Published Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 3 p581 Published: HTBM Part 9: Plate XXXVIII PM I Part 1: p. 15

See J. H. Taylor, 'The Burial Assemblage of Henutmehyt: Inventory, Date and Provenance' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 59-72, esp. 69.
Bibliographic references: James 1970 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 9. (Pl.38)
